author: Vijay Pandey
title: Photo Essay – Raging Inferno
text:
Comment 
The following photo feature illustrates the terrifying aftermath of a caste based killing, carried out on the sly, in the early hours of Tuesday, in Sunpedh Village, located in Faridabad, Haryana. 
An alleged dispute between the Dalits and Rajputs, over the mobile phone, had last year caused clashes between the two communities, that lead to the death of three adults. 
This incident, however, was an act of revenge, where the attackers, belonging to the dominant Rajput caste, doused the victim’s house with petrol, and set it alight. As a result, the family of four, who were asleep at the time, lost their two children, aged 3, and 9 months, to burn injuries. 
In the photo feature, can be seen the father, who injured his palms, and has now been released from the hospital. Also evident is the suffering of the bereaved family members.
